name: tm12
effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sweet Scent Gen I: Water Gun)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
